name: Microphone Arm Stand, FIFINE Suspension Boom Scissor Mic Stand with Heavy Duty Clamp, 3/8" to 5/8" Adapter, for Voice-over, Gaming, Recording, Studio, Home Office (CS1)
short_description: UPGRADED DESK CLAMP of MIC STAND- In comparison to other versions, this metal desk clamp is built with anti-scratch pad and wider mouth up to 2" to fit most desktop. It also has a fixed knob, so the swing arm does not move freely after the knob is locked.

ANGLE ADJUSTMENT-The suspension boom arm stand provides 180° up and down rotation adjustment. The mic arm stand gives a wide extension and provides your mic with full range of motion. Attaching your mic to the arm stand (adapter included) will allow you to place the mic closer to your mouth which will result in a richer, fuller tone to your voice.

STURDY METAL MATERIAL-Made of sturdy metal, the mic arm stand is attached with strong and elastic springs to upgrade the stability and durability of the suspension arm stand. When you unintentionally hit the desk while adjusting the arm or playing games, the stand will not shake strongly. The boom arm gives you more stable whether adjusting position, angle of arm stand or carrying and moving microphone.

FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE-The arm stand can be folded to save more desktop space. You can also take the mic stand out for recording anytime, which suitable for people who own less desktop space. You can also put it in your bag and carry the boom arm to somewhere you want to record or podcast.

WIDE COMPATIBILITY-Coming with 5/8'' to 3/8'' metal adapter, the extendable boom arm is compatible with many microphones, such as the Fifine K669B, K670, K683A, K658, K688, AmpliGame (A6V, A8), AM8 usb microphones. (Mics are not included.) The mic stand is greatly suitable for gaming, streaming, podcasting or more scenes, and also friendly to recording beginner.
Tips: 1) The desk clamp is suitable for desktop with a thickness of 2’’or less. 2) The microphone is not included.

name: CAHAYA Mic Stand Boom Arm - Low Profile Adjustable Microphone Arm Stand with 3.5" Extension Pole Desk Clamp Screw Adapter for Streaming Gaming Compatible with Blue Yeti Shure SM58 SM48 Fifine K669B
short_description: [LOW-PROFILE DESIGN]: CAHAYA mic stand features a low-profile design that can be discreetly tucks beneath your monitor, saving desk space and keeping your workspace tidy. If you find the height insufficient, you can easily add the included 3.5-in extension pole to quickly increase the height of the mic stand, ensuring the microphone is positioned at the optimal angle to meet various needs.

[SAFE AND RELIABLE]: Crafted from premium iron, this mic stand boom arm supports up to 5.5 lbs, making it perfect for various mic and accessories. The high-quality C-style clamp securely attaches to desks up to 3.5 in thick and features a silicone-covered contact surface to prevent any damage or scratches. Whether your desk is wooden or metal, the silicone padding ensures a firm, stable grip while protecting your workspace.

[FLEXIBLE ANGLE ADJUST]: Whether you're recording or streaming a video, the boom microphone stand offers great flexibility in angle adjustment. The vertical adjustment range is 220°, allowing you to achieve various optimal recording angles for the best sound quality. The horizontal rotation range is 360°, ensuring ideal sound recording and a comfortable working position.

[BUILT-IN CABLE MANAGEMENT CHANNEL]: This mic arm stand features a hidden cable management channel. Simply remove the rubber cable cover to neatly hide the cables inside the channel. It won't cause your setup or cables to tangle during recording or streaming, keeping your desk tidy. This design also effectively eliminates cable tangling, creating a more organized and efficient workspace.

[STRONG COMPATIBILITY]: This desk microphone stand features screw adapters for 3/8" to 5/8" and 3/8" to 1/4" adapters, making it suitable for various microphone connections and ensuring smooth installation of almost any type of microphone. Additionally, it comes with a mic shock mount that effectively reduces noise caused by vibrations or bumps during recording, enhancing sound quality.

name: Microphone Boom Arm - Heavy Duty Low Profile Metal Mic Arm Stand with Desk Clamp & Cable Management, 360° Rotatable, Fits Shure SM7B/MV7, Blue Yeti, Fifine AM8, AT2020 for Podcasting & Gaming
short_description: [Ultra-Low Profile Mic Arm - No Screen Blocking] Unlike bulky scissor arms or desk stands that crowd your workspace, this low profile mic arm slides neatly under your monitor—eliminating screen obstruction during intense gaming, live streaming, or podcast recording. It keeps your setup clean and minimalist, so you can focus on content creation instead of messy gear.

[5LBS Heavy Duty Metal Build - Rock-Solid Stability] Crafted from premium metal (no flimsy plastic!), this mic boom arm supports heavy microphones up to 5LBS—perfect for pro models like Shure SM7B and Blue Yeti that cheaper arms can’t handle. The anti-scratch C-clamp fits desks 0.8–3 inches thick, locking securely without damaging your desktop and staying stable even when fully extended or accidentally bumped.

[360° Tool-Free Adjustment - Instant Positioning] Skip the Allen wrenches—this microphone arm features easy-turn knobs for smooth, tool-free adjustments. Swivel 360°, tilt 180°, or extend up to 29 inches to find your ideal mic position in seconds. Whether you’re sitting, standing, or using a multi-screen setup, it adapts seamlessly to podcasting, gaming, or video call needs.

[Universal Compatibility - No Extra Adapters Needed] This low profile boom arm comes with 3/8” to 1/4” and 3/8” to 5/8” screw adapters, working seamlessly with top microphones (Shure SM7B/MV7, Rode PodMic, HyperX QuadCast, etc.) as well as webcams and ring lights. Save money on extra parts—everything you need is included for a hassle-free setup.

[Built-In Cable Management - Tangle-Free Setup] Keep your desk tidy with integrated cable slots and snap-on clips on this mic arm. Hide messy mic cables to avoid tangles, accidental tugs mid-recording, and unsightly wires in your stream. It’s the simple upgrade that makes your workspace look professional and organized.
